title: Executive Order 8387-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of December 5, 1913
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 stat. 847, the Executive Order of December 5, 1913, creating Public Water Reserve No. 12, is hereby revoked in so far as it pertains to or affects the following-described land in Wyoming:
T. 46 N., R. 71 W.,     sec. 18, SW¼SE¼;     sec. 19, S½NE¼, N½SE¼;     sec. 21, N½NW¼.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8387-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of December 5, 1913 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371926
